author: jaz
msg: now adds the component name to the servlet context

author: chamikara
msg: Some changes to the RMScenarioTest - Omited the checking of the termination of the response message in WSRM 1.0 sync
InOut case. Since we terminate with the SandeshaClient.terminateSequence method, we send the Empty Body Last Message
but still the server has not corrected to respond with a LastMessage.

author: chamikara
msg: - This was not sending an ampty LastMessage in the WSRM 1.0 case, but this is wrong according to the protocol.

author: seelmann
msg: Added local name support, now it's possibe to specify the root entry of the SelectEntryDialog.
